description:
An incredible news story rocks the world: “Joker Arrested!” But Inspector Oniyama isn`t pleased by the news. Joker and Hachi are taken to the inescapable island prison, “Demon`s Heaven.” The warden, Jason, suspicious of Joker`s voluntary incarceration, keeps a close eye on him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Great Escape from Demon`s Heaven
デモンズヘブンからの大脱出
